incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Vodacom Network in Mozambique

incident_updates.body: We continue experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Vodacom network in Mozambique. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 16 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: SMS Garbled Messages From Subset Verizon Numbers to Twilio Toll-Free Numbers

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience issues with a subset of Verizon US subscribers sending messages containing non-ASCII characters to Twilio Toll-Free numbers. Our engineers are still working with our carrier partner to deploy the fix. Next update will be provided on January 26th at 7:00 PT or as soon as more information becomes available.

incident_updates.body:
Our service partner is conducting a planned maintenance from 25 January 2024 at 21:00 PST until 25 January 2024 at 22:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for the following country and carrier: Bell Canada, Rogers Canada, Telus Canada

Impacted Products: Lookup Identity Match, Verify Silent Network Auth, Lookup Line Type Intelligence [Twilio API], Lookup SIM Swap, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

scheduled_maintenances.name: Planned Maintenance for Flex Insights Historical Reporting

incident_updates.body: The Flex Insights Historical Reporting dashboards visualisation partner in the US is conducting a planned maintenance on Saturday, Januray 27th, 2024, at 1:00 AM Pacific Standard Time. The maintenance window is planned to take up to 2 hours. During the maintenance window Flex Insights Historical Reporting access will be unavailable.

The ClearSky: Inteliquent (Onvoy) network in the United States is conducting a planned maintenance from 24 January 2024 at 21:00 PST until 25 January 2024 at 01:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from ClearSky: Inteliquent (Onvoy) US handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US SMS Carrier Maintenance - Small US Carriers

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America

incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

A subset of small US networks in the US are conducting a planned maintenance from 24 January 2024 at 20:00 PST until 25 January 2024 at 00:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from small US carriers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US, Canada and Puerto Rico Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Long Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America

incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Our SMS and MMS carrier partner in US, Canada and Puerto Rico is conducting a planned maintenance from 23 January 2024 at 20:00 PST until 25 January 2024 at 03:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS and MMS to and from US, Canada and Puerto Rico handsets via subset of Shortcodes and Longcodes.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Tele2

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Europe

incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 10 January 2024 at 12:00 PST until 31 January 2024 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Tele2 Russia handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

10 January 2024 at 12:00 PST until 10 January 2024 at 16:00 PST
15 January 2024 at 12:00 PST until 15 January 2024 at 16:00 PST
17 January 2024 at 12:00 PST until 17 January 2024 at 16:00 PST
22 January 2024 at 12:00 PST until 22 January 2024 at 16:00 PST
24 January 2024 at 12:00 PST until 24 January 2024 at 16:00 PST
29 January 2024 at 12:00 PST until 29 January 2024 at 16:00 PST
31 January 2024 at 12:00 PST until 31 January 2024 at 16:00 PST

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Europe
